ygData.subject: Want to teach and learn languages...
ygData.msgSnippet: My character Baneseeker is on the Tunare server. I want to offer languages to anyone who is willing to share their language with me. I am excellent in the
ygData.messageBody:
My character Baneseeker is on the Tunare server.
I want to offer languages to anyone who is willing
to share their language with me. I am excellent in
the following:<br><br>Dark
Speech<br>Teir`Dal<br>Dragon<br>Dwarvish<br>Elvish<br>Barbarian<br>Common (duh)<br><br>I want to
learn:<br>Erudite<br>Ogre<br>Troll<br>Faerie<br>Elder Dragon<br>Gnome<br><br>You can contact me in game
or reply here to set up a time to exchange
knowledge. I am currently in South Karana.
